tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 用是比相其行具足，當視是菩薩摩訶薩如阿惟越致。 用是故，說其比相行當令知之。

src_original: ākārās tāni liṅgāni tani nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi. sacet subhūte kācid eva strī vā puruṣo vā amanuṣyeṇa adhiṣṭhito bhavet,
tgt_original: 或時，須菩提！ 若男子、女人為鬼神所下，若為所持。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ samanvāhartavyaṃ:
tgt_original: 是彼菩薩若作是念：

src_original: saced ahaṃ vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ  samyaksaṃbodhau parisamyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariśuddho me 'dhyāśayo yathā  aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim  abhisaṃboddhukāmo yathā aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye pariśuddhaś
tgt_original: 『設我受決以，過去怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三佛授我阿耨多羅三耶三菩者，實慊苦有異，當得阿耨多羅三耶三菩阿惟三佛。

src_original: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittam apagataṃ me pratyekabuddhacittam,
tgt_original: 若於阿耨多羅三耶三菩阿惟三佛所念皆清淨者，為却羅漢、辟支佛心。

src_original: na ca sākṣātkaroti. idaṃ subhūte avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya-avaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ
tgt_original: 當知菩薩摩訶薩是為阿惟越致相。

src_original: apagataśrāvākapratyekabuddhacittena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā,  na ahaṃ na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
tgt_original: 設以却羅漢、辟支佛心者，會當作阿耨多羅三耶三菩，不得不成自致阿惟三佛。

src_original: abhisaṃbhotsya eva aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. ye te 'pi te asaṃkhyeya-aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,  na teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcid ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam
tgt_original: 若當得佛為阿耨多羅三耶三菩者，阿僧祇剎土現在諸佛無不見者、無不證者。

src_original: asākṣātkṛtam anabhisaṃbuddham. yathā me te buddhā bhagavanto jānanty āśayam iti hi  [f. 216b] aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. anena satyena satyavacanena
tgt_original: 今怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三佛悉知我所念無有異，我審作阿耨多羅三耶三菩阿惟三佛者，審如我之所言，是鬼神即當去。 』便告言：

src_original: iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā yena amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto vā viheṭhito vā so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmatu.
tgt_original: 『是男子女人為何鬼神所持？ 』鬼神聞其所言即去。

src_original: sacet subhūte so 'manuṣyas tato na apakrāmati,  tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya,  veditavyaṃ subhūte na ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. sacet (AdSPG I 7)
tgt_original: 說是語時，設不去者，是菩薩為未受決，過去怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三菩不授阿耨多羅三耶三菩。

src_original: veditavyam. punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'py  anekaśataparivāram anekasahasraparivāraṃ anekaśatasahasraparivāram anekakoṭīparivāram  anekakoṭīsahasraparivāram anekakoṭīśatasahasraparivāram anekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivāraṃ
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩於夢中，與若干百若干千若干億千弟子共會，在其中坐，為諸比丘僧說法，如怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三佛之所說法。

src_original: punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya so 'manuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmati,  veditavyaṃ subhūte vyākṛto vatāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair  arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhi
tgt_original: 若說是言邪即去者，知是菩薩為以受決，過去怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三菩所授阿耨多羅三耶三菩。

src_original: bodhisattvanyāmam anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati. sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kariṣyati:
tgt_original: 「其人審至誠者，弊魔往到菩薩摩訶薩所。 若菩薩言：

src_original: yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
tgt_original: 『我審至誠者已受決為阿耨多羅三耶三菩，是邪鬼神即當去。

src_original: anena satyena satyavacanena ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmatu. tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate,
tgt_original: 』弊魔用是故作好心，化令邪鬼神悉去。

src_original: kim ity ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmet. tata kasya hetos?
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatra autsukyam āpatsyate,  katham ayam amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed iti. evaṃ sa māra adhiṣṭhānena tato 'pakramiṣyati. evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati:
tgt_original: 弊魔極尊，有威神故，諸邪鬼神不敢當之。 是皆魔威神之所辟。 用是故，悉為除去。 若菩薩自念：

src_original: mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānto. na punar evaṃ jñāsyati:
tgt_original: 『用我威神故。

src_original: mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣyo 'pakrānta iti. sa tena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullapiṣyati uccagghiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyaty:
tgt_original: 』是彼菩薩摩訶薩以自謂是，便反自貢高，輕易於人、形笑他人而無所錄。

src_original: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,  ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, (AdSPG I 8)
tgt_original: 語人言： 『我從過去怛薩阿竭阿羅訶三耶三佛所授決以，其餘人者悉未受決。 為阿耨多羅三耶三佛所授決以，其餘人者悉未受決為阿耨多羅三耶三菩。

src_original: sa tāvanmātrakeṇa mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati mānam utpādayiṣyati,  dūrīkariṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ dūrīkariṣyaty anuttaraṃ buddhajñānam. sa tathārūpo sattvas tāvatā anupāyakuśalo 'dhimānam utpādayiṣyati,
tgt_original: 』用是故，自可自高、恚怒稍增，即離薩芸若大遠，失阿耨多羅三耶三佛慧。

src_original: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye. katame dve bhūmī?  yaduta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena tasya bodhisattvasy
tgt_original: 知是輩菩薩無漚和拘舍羅而自貢高，便在二道地墮聲聞、辟支佛地。
